Cost-of-living crisis: Building consents plunge in Tauranga amid housing shortage https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/cost-of-living-crisis-building-consents-plunge-in-tauranga-amid-housing-shortage/LWPPIPF2OZAFDFZ5TEIWLK76SQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/cost-of-living-crisis-building-consents-plunge-in-tauranga-amid-housing-shortage/LWPPIPF2OZAFDFZ5TEIWLK76SQ/ Kiri Gillespie'We are nowhere near where we should be.' Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:01:00 +0000 The number of new building consents in Tauranga has plummeted, reflecting a national trend and prompting concerns house prices will rise when the city is already grappling with a housing shortage.
Letters: Is this how the Government treats our vulnerable disabled?; Kāinga Ora tenant supports crackdown https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-is-this-how-the-government-treats-our-vulnerable-disabled-kainga-ora-tenant-supports-crackdown/4XEESYSMWZC2PCE2Y5ICSHSAAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-is-this-how-the-government-treats-our-vulnerable-disabled-kainga-ora-tenant-supports-crackdown/4XEESYSMWZC2PCE2Y5ICSHSAAU/ OPINION: Will this Govt succumb to foot-in-mouth disease? Far North youths leading the way with He Taura programme https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-youth-leading-the-way-with-he-taura-programme/LANR2P37WNE2XHVMO2MIG3ES24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-youth-leading-the-way-with-he-taura-programme/LANR2P37WNE2XHVMO2MIG3ES24/ Three initiatives by young people accepted by Whatu Ora. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 He Taura for 2024 are, clockwise from back left, Liva Christie, Watene McKay, Noah McBirney-Warnes, Tereana Ihakara, Allegra Austen-Reid, the Moko Foundation’s Ariana Smith, Annalys Riddle, Mereana Thomas, Te Manea McKay, Whare Christie, and Torenze Tahere
Employment disputes linked to husband of stood-down Green MP Darleen Tana’s revealed amid migrant exploitation row https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/employment-disputes-linked-to-husband-of-stood-down-green-mp-darleen-tanas-revealed-amid-migrant-exploitation-row/ZI5MRBEUW5DHJF7HFJY466C6PY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/employment-disputes-linked-to-husband-of-stood-down-green-mp-darleen-tanas-revealed-amid-migrant-exploitation-row/ZI5MRBEUW5DHJF7HFJY466C6PY/ Raphael FranksERA decisions highlight a history of issues with Hoff-Nielsen's companies. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Christian Hoff-Nielsen, husband of Darleen Tana has addressed past instances where he was found to have never paid an employee and fired another 'on the spot', resulting in his companies having to pay tens of thousands of dollars in compensation and unpaid wages to the two men. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Kiwifruit: Zespri’s RubyRed supply expected to triple in volume this year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/kiwifruit-zespris-rubyred-supply-expected-to-triple-in-volume-this-year/PGBMGWHAUZHHJI3XZF4TLMLCZU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/kiwifruit-zespris-rubyred-supply-expected-to-triple-in-volume-this-year/PGBMGWHAUZHHJI3XZF4TLMLCZU/ Zespri's RubyRed kiwifruit variety is in its third year of commercial production. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 RubyRed is the first kiwifruit variety to be harvested at the start of the season.
Teen inflicts ‘severe’ head injuries on 17-day-old baby, doesn’t seek medical help, plays PlayStation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teen-inflicts-severe-head-injuries-on-17-day-old-baby-doesnt-seek-medical-help-plays-playstation/UR5ZEWPMJNFF3LAN3H43HA3JS4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teen-inflicts-severe-head-injuries-on-17-day-old-baby-doesnt-seek-medical-help-plays-playstation/UR5ZEWPMJNFF3LAN3H43HA3JS4/ Belinda FeekIt was several hours before the badly injured girl was taken to hospital. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Instead of seeking medical assistance for the severely injured 17-day-old baby, Taine Davey played on his PlayStation 4. He then began setting up a trampoline. Photo / Facebook
